What I do is that I set matchmaking to "closed" till my friends join in, just open it again when they're joined for randos.
My friends and I use g-portal currently. It performs well enough, just needs a restart once you notice a performance drop.
Might be a corrupted save. Try deleting or cleaning.

WRITING.TITLE: Gunner Zipline
WRITING.TEXT: Don't know if its been suggested before but cant we use the gunner's zip line to transport the big minerals (top off my head Aquarqs).. Just attach them on and they zip? lol
